埋伏.definition: to ambush; to lie in wait for; to lie low; ambush

埋名.definition: to conceal one's identity; to live incognito

埋單.definition: to pay the bill (in a restaurant etc) (loanword from Cantonese); (fig.) to bear responsibility

埋天怨地.definition: lit. to blame the heavens and reproach the earth; fig. to rave and rant

埋怨.definition: to complain; to grumble (about); to reproach; to blame

埋沒.definition: to engulf; to bury; to overlook; to stifle; to neglect; to fall into oblivion

埋藏.definition: to bury; to hide by burying; hidden

埋設.definition: to install (water pipes, landmines etc) underground

埋頭.definition: to immerse oneself in; engrossed in sth; to lower the head (e.g. to avoid rain); countersunk (of screws, rivets etc)

埋頭苦幹.definition: to bury oneself in work (idiom); to be engrossed in work; to make an all-out effort; up to the neck in work

埋首.definition: to immerse oneself in (one's work, studies etc)
